link.title: Stratford Community School
link.script:

div.data-code: <marquee style="font-size: 30px; color: white; face="frank">Stratford Community Schools will remain closed through at least Thursday, April 30. We will continue to provide meal services while the school closures remain in effect.</marquee>

h3.div: Honoring Our Past....Celebrating Our Present....Building Our Future
